name: Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Review all drawings and documentation provided to the Contractor.
Acceptance Criteria - Prior to the commencement of Works it must be ensure that all necessary documentation has been provided.
Frequency - Prior to the commencement of Works

Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - All setting out shall be performed by or under the control of a licensed surveyor, who shall certify the accuracy of key dimensions of the as constructed works. Specs 1000: 3.2.4
Acceptance Criteria - Levels and position Set Out matches marks shown on the Drawings, 2D data and linework provided or agreed with the Engineer
Verifying Document - Compliance surveys or spot checks
Frequency - Prior to the commencement of Works
3.10 - Concrete Manhole, Catchpits and Access Chambers
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Precast concrete estructures shall comply with NZS 3106. Specs 1131: 14.5
Acceptance Criteria - Manhole charasteritics Match NZS 3106
Verifying Document - Delivery docket, Supplier certificate, Photo
Frequency - Prior to the commencement of Works
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Excavate to achieve required depth as per drawings C250, C106
○ Floor of trench to be even across width and length
Acceptance Criteria - Trench width and chamber clearance to walls comply with requirements
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - Visual, Measurement Check
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Bedding should be minimum 150mm compacted material
Acceptance Criteria - Bedding to comply with requirements
○ Scala test to achieve 2 blows per 50mm
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - Visual, Measurement Check
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Chambers shall be installed true to the design level
Acceptance Criteria - levels are within the tolerance and according to the drawings, 2D data and linework provided or agreed with the Engineer

Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Benching concrete shall have a crushing strength of 20MPa at 28 days. All benching and sloping surfaces on manhole floor shall be rendered in 20mm thick 1:3 mortar
Acceptance Criteria - Benching built up to the specifications

Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Two hard copies and one electronic copy of As-built drawings shall be prepared in draft and final versions following Schedule 1D in NZS4404:2010. Specs 1000: 3.9.2
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Manholes should be tested seperately to pipeline for water tightness up to lower rim of manhole cover frame. Specs 1131: 16.2.2.5
Acceptance Criteria - A maximum drop in water level over 30 min should not exceed 2mL/hr/mm of diameter/meter height of the manhole.
